cloth_config.vow_cloud.enabled.descripti: Enables/Disables the connecting to custom server and playing audio.
cloth_config.vow_cloud.auto_progress.des: Automatically progress to next dialogue when one finished playing
cloth_config.vow_cloud.auto_progress_del: The delay to add until progressed when audio finished playing
cloth_config.vow_cloud.send_fun_facts.de: Sends a fun fact in chat when joining Wynncraft
cloth_config.vow_cloud.use_local_host.de: Use a localhost server for the mod. ONLY SET THIS TO TRUE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING!
